snippet.title: Alanna The Princess Of Puzzles
snippet.description:
#GDevelop #CompleteGame #sale #pixelart #puzzles
Get Windows, MacOS or Linux versions here: https://www.humblebundle.com/g/alanna-the-princess-of-puzzles
https://www.kartridge.com/games/UlisesFreitas/alanna-the-princess-of-puzzles
https://ulisesfreitas.itch.io/alanna-the-princess-of-puzzles
--
A new story begins help the princess Alanna to defeat all monsters in the castle of shadows.
#20 Levels #SolvePuzzles #2Bosses #indiegame #gdevelop5 
GDevelop 5 - WTF Wars - Turn based template
Play and source code: https://ulisesfreitas.itch.io/gdevelop-wtf-wars-turn-based-template
Preview: https://youtu.be/DXpCrShGKGA
--
GDevelop WTF WARS Snake Edition template
Source code:https://ulisesfreitas.itch.io/wtf-wars-snake-edition-a-different-snake-game-for-gdevelop
--
WTF Wars Rhythm Edition   template for GDevelop 5
Source code:https://ulisesfreitas.itch.io/wtf-wars-rhythm-edition-a-musical-game-for-gdevelop
--
Socceralia - The ball is your friend - template for GDevelop 5.
Play and source code: https://ulisesfreitas.itch.io/socceralia-the-ball-is-your-friend-gdevelop-5-template
Preview: https://youtu.be/lWRfrBEspqc
--
Castlia: Castlevania like template for GDevelop 5.
Play & Source code: https://ulisesfreitas.itch.io/castlia-a-vania-like-template-for-gdevelop-5
Preview: https://youtu.be/jFDJXviyJr8
--
Shootalia: Top down shooter template for GDevelop 5.
Play & Source code: https://ulisesfreitas.itch.io/top-down-shooter-template-for-gdevelop-5
Preview: https://youtu.be/QOGNkFxTzec
--
Aeralia: air fighting template for GDevelop 5.
Play & Source code: https://ulisesfreitas.itch.io/aeralia-aircraft-battles-template-gdevelop
Preview: https://youtu.be/Tz4gAgE1NwY
--
Inventoralia: - Inventory and shop template for GDevelop 5.
Play & Source code: https://ulisesfreitas.itch.io/gdevelop-inventoralia-inventory-shop-template
Preview: https://youtu.be/T9SSYADX650
--
Racealia: Enjoy racing to the max template for GDevelop 5.
Play & Source code: https://ulisesfreitas.itch.io/racealia-gdevelop-5-template
Preview: https://youtu.be/mBs4iQjF1_w
--
Toweralia: Tower defense template for GDevelop 5.
Play & Source code: https://ulisesfreitas.itch.io/toweralia-a-tower-defense-template-for-gdevelop
Preview: https://youtu.be/6pGBkj5cigk
--
Farmalia - Farm & Build template for GDevelop 5.
Source code: https://ulisesfreitas.itch.io/farmalia-farm-build-gdevelop-5-template
Preview: https://youtu.be/OAB7fgNaAjw


No need to pay, but any donation is appreciated.
